summary: This is an internal communication from August 6, 2019, indicating that the SDNY (Southern District of New York) is drafting a search warrant affidavit for Jeffrey Epstein's island off St. Thomas. The warrant is expected to be sworn out that Friday, and the FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad (C-20) is involved.

events.title: Expected swearing of search warrant for Epstein's island
events.description: The Southern District of New York is drafting a search warrant affidavit for Epstein's island off St. Thomas, with the warrant expected to be sworn out on the Friday following this communication.

keyFacts: The Southern District of New York (SDNY) was actively drafting a search warrant affidavit for Jeffrey Epstein's private island near St. Thomas in August 2019.
The FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad (C-20) was involved in the investigation and warrant process.
The warrant was anticipated to be sworn out on the Friday following August 6, 2019, indicating imminent law enforcement action.
The document highlights the focus on Epstein's island as a location of interest in the investigation into crimes against children and human trafficking.
